subject: Re: [junit] C unit testing framework?
msgSnippet: ... We ve been using something called embUnit for C testing.  The project may be dead but we ve been improving it and want to post our changes back to some
messageBody:
On Thu, Feb 25, 2010 at 6:05 AM, David Saff <david@...> wrote:

> Sorry for a slight off-topic query. I need to help a team familiar
> with JUnit that just adopted a project written in C (not C++). Any
> suggestions which of the options at
> http://opensourcetesting.org/unit_c.php would be optimal for this
> team? Many thanks,
>

We've been using something called embUnit for C testing. The project may be
dead but we've been improving it and want to post our changes back to some
shared repository.

I've CCed Keith Ray, who could answer specific questions about this.

--
best regards,
jk
